laboratory_examinations.findings: sFlt-1 levels ranged from 8,028 to 18,738 pg/mL with a mean of 14,123 pg/mL in untreated women.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Untreated women had admission sFlt-1 values that did not show a specific progression over time, whereas in treated patients, sFlt-1 levels were reduced in a dose-dependent fashion with treatments.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Post apheresis results showed sFlt-1 levels reduced to 12,475 pg/mL after apheresis treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Each apheresis treatment led to reductions in sFlt-1 levels by 17% to 34%, followed by rebounds in levels over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Protein-to-creatinine ratios were significantly elevated prior to and decreased post apheresis treatments.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: In treated patients, the protein-to-creatinine ratio fell significantly after apheresis but often rebounded over the following days.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Plasma fibrinogen levels reduced by approximately 20% after apheresis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Fibrinogen levels returned to baseline within 24 hours post-treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Hemoglobin levels ranged from 10.7 to 13.2 g/L in patients undergoing apheresis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Hemoglobin levels appeared stable without significant changes noted.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Creatinine levels in patients ranged from 37 to 61 Âµmol/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: No significant changes in creatinine levels were specified over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: SGOT levels ranged from 20 to 87 U/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: No specific changes in SGOT levels over time were documented.

laboratory_examinations.findings: SGPT levels ranged from 18 to 64 U/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: No specific changes in SGPT levels over time were documented.

laboratory_examinations.findings: LDH levels ranged from 185 to 265 U/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: No specific changes in LDH levels over time were documented.
